title: Chalice Cover, late 17th–early 18th century
provenance: ex-collection: Ida Schiff and Frances Morris
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Chalice cover of elaborate candlestick pattern connected by brides picotées, decorated by fleur volantes and interspersed by portes and gaze quadrillée.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chalice Cover, late 17th–early 18th century.
late 17th–early 18th century. Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-234.
